ThingDef.label: ursine genome
ThingDef.description:
A payload of ursine genetic material. Can be used at the genomorpher to create a growth cell of a hybrid animal. This tier 1 genome can be used as either a primary or secondary genome.

<color=#E5E54C>Gameplay effect:</color> All primary ursine hybrids have stunning attacks, and high body size.

<color=#E5E54C>Extraction:</color> Can be extracted via the genome extractor table or any genome excavator from:

ThingDef.label: avian genome
ThingDef.description:
A payload of avian genetic material. Can be used at the genomorpher to create a growth cell of a hybrid animal. This tier 1 genome can be used as either a primary or secondary genome.

<color=#E5E54C>Gameplay effect:</color> All primary avian hybrids lay eggs. Combat avian hybrids get increased movement speed.

<color=#E5E54C>Extraction:</color> Can be extracted via the genome extractor table or any genome excavator from:

ThingDef.label: boom genome
ThingDef.description:
A payload of boom genetic material. Can be used at the genomorpher to create a growth cell of a hybrid animal. This tier 1 genome can be used as either a primary or secondary genome.

<color=#E5E54C>Gameplay effect:</color> All boom hybrids explode on death. Farm hybrids produce chemfuel, while combat hybrids can use exploding abilities.

<color=#E5E54C>Extraction:</color> Can be extracted via the genome extractor table or any genome excavator from:

ThingDef.label: muffalo genome
ThingDef.description:
A payload of muffalo genetic material. Can be used at the genomorpher to create a growth cell of a hybrid animal. This tier 1 genome can be used as either a primary or secondary genome.

<color=#E5E54C>Gameplay effect:</color> All muffalo hybrid animals are pack animals, with primary muffalo hybrids getting 50% increased capacity caravaning. All muffalo hybrids have an increase to minimum comfortable temperature.

<color=#E5E54C>Extraction:</color> Can be extracted via the genome extractor table or any genome excavator from:

ThingDef.label: canine genome
ThingDef.description:
A payload of canine genetic material. Can be used at the genomorpher to create a growth cell of a hybrid animal. This tier 1 genome can be used as either a primary or secondary genome.

<color=#E5E54C>Gameplay effect:</color> All primary canine hybrids have the adrenaline rush ability. All canine hybrids have fast attack speed.

<color=#E5E54C>Extraction:</color> Can be extracted via the genome extractor table or any genome excavator from:

ThingDef.label: rodent/leporid genome
ThingDef.description:
A payload of rodent genetic material. Can be used at the genomorpher to create a growth cell of a hybrid animal. This tier 1 genome can be used as either a primary or secondary genome.

<color=#E5E54C>Gameplay effect:</color> All rodent hybrids have a reduced body size, but greatly increased reproduction rates (if fertile).

<color=#E5E54C>Extraction:</color> Can be extracted via the genome extractor table or any genome excavator from:

ThingDef.label: feline genome
ThingDef.description:
A payload of feline genetic material. Can be used at the genomorpher to create a growth cell of a hybrid animal. This tier 1 genome can be used as either a primary or secondary genome.

<color=#E5E54C>Gameplay effect:</color> All feline hybrids have an inherent dodge chance. Combat feline hybrids get a further increase to dodge chance.

<color=#E5E54C>Extraction:</color> Can be extracted via the genome extractor table or any genome excavator from:

ThingDef.label: humanoid genome
ThingDef.description:
A payload of humanoid genetic material. Can be used at the genomorpher to create a growth cell of a hybrid animal. This tier 1 genome can be used as either a primary or secondary genome.

<color=#E5E54C>Gameplay effect:</color> All humanoid hybrids have a somewhat decent level of intelligence and can do various tasks around the colony.

<color=#E5E54C>Extraction:</color> Can be extracted via the genome extractor table or any genome excavator from any sentient humanoid.

ThingDef.label: equine genome
ThingDef.description:
A payload of equine genetic material. Can be used at the genomorpher to create a growth cell of a hybrid animal. This tier 2 genome can only be used as primary genome.

<color=#E5E54C>Gameplay effect:</color> All equine hybrids have increased caravaning speed.

<color=#E5E54C>Extraction:</color> Can only be extracted via any genome excavator from:

ThingDef.label: insectoid genome
ThingDef.description:
A payload of insectoid genetic material. Can be used at the genomorpher to create a growth cell of a hybrid animal. This tier 2 genome can only be used as primary genome.

<color=#E5E54C>Gameplay effect:</color> All hybrids with insectoid genome get 100% toxic resistance as well as an armor increase. Combat hybrids get a further increase to armor.

<color=#E5E54C>Extraction:</color> Can only be extracted via any genome excavator from:

ThingDef.label: reptile genome
ThingDef.description:
A payload of reptile genetic material. Can be used at the genomorpher to create a growth cell of a hybrid animal. This tier 2 genome can only be used as primary genome.

<color=#E5E54C>Gameplay effect:</color> All reptile hybrids have greatly increased minimum and maximum comfortable temperature. They also have melee and ranged venomous attacks.

<color=#E5E54C>Extraction:</color> Can only be extracted via any genome excavator from:

ThingDef.label: colossal genome
ThingDef.description:
A payload of colossal genetic material. Can be used at the genomorpher to create a growth cell of a hybrid animal. This tier 3 genome can only be used as primary genome.

<color=#E5E54C>Gameplay effect:</color> Extreme increase in size, health, damage and market value at the cost of slower attack speed.

<color=#E5E54C>Extraction:</color> Can only be extracted via an archotech genome excavator from:

ThingDef.label: template genome
ThingDef.description: Absolutely and completely worthless, but when properly processed alongside an actual genome it can be trimmed down to an identical copy.
